name: Alis 0.2.0
description:
The main essence of the project is to transfer the real location (start from here - https://goo.gl/d3ODsm ), mechanics to the virtual space with the gaming fun and the educational elements. 
On the first stage - survive in city location of war conditions. 

Trying to make mechanics as close to real and you can already test it: a dynamic change of the day with an impact on the character, the energy system (the food and consumption has real values of calories), thirst, sleep and bleeding.
